definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: I'm a forth year student at TS Univ.
sentences.chinese: 我是TS大学的一名大四学生。

sentences.english: For example I don't know how many players in the world who could score that fourth goal he scored.
sentences.chinese: 比如我不知道世界上有多少人能像他那样成就大四喜。

sentences.english: In the school of foreign languages, several advanced options are offered for students in their junior or senior years.
sentences.chinese: 外语学院为大三和大四的学生开设了高级选修课。

sentences.english: Hinrich at the University of Kansas is the most glorious period in his senior year.
sentences.chinese: 辛里奇在堪萨斯大学最辉煌的时期是在他大四的那年。

sentences.english: Wang is a senior mechanical engineering and automation major.
sentences.chinese: 王弘毅是就读于机械工程与自动化专业的大四学生。

sentences.english: That first category may include people like Guo Fuyuan, a senior at Xi'an International Studies University.
sentences.chinese: 郭芙元，西安外国语大学大四学生，就属于前者。

sentences.english: He manages to maintain a squeaky - clean reputation in his senior year in school.
sentences.chinese: 他在大四的时候，仍能保持他那洁白如玉的声誉。

sentences.english: Then, on Halloween of my senior year, I met Sam.
sentences.chinese: 然后在大四的万圣节前夕，我认识了萨姆。

sentences.english: Should you have any queries, please feel free to contact me.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎大四有意向参加实习的同学与我联系。

sentences.english: I'm a 4th year science major in university.
sentences.chinese: 我现在在大学理科读大四。

sentences.english: Yu Lei, a 24-year-old senior at Hebei University, marvels at how fast the translators work.
sentences.chinese: 24岁的于磊是河北大学大四的学生。

sentences.english: An undergraduate who is not yet a senior.
sentences.chinese: 还没有上大四的大学肄业生。

sentences.english: You have known three presidents; I one senior class.
sentences.chinese: 你们认识三任校长，我只认识一届大四学生。

definition: foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program
to recommend sb for postgraduate studies/to admit for postgraduate studies without taking the entrance exam
